title: Hour 1 Tom Verducci 080320
itunes:title: Hour 1 Tom Verducci 080320
description:
Tom Verducci tells Dan that major league baseball is having some success on the field. Tom says baseball players are being told that they cannot get together for pizza and drinks after a game.
